title: Servers lagging?
body: Keep disconnecting in the middle of the game and so is the other team

replies.body: Also, will the game be loss prevented?
Oh hey.  I'm in the same game as you; I'm the Morg.
Same thing happened to me. Please be loss prevented.
Please be loss prevented Riot, just had the same thing in my prelims {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
